creator: Jimmy.Winn@gmail.com
text:
We are using Ant and have a build.xml file using "sshexec".  sshexec requires a
username and password.  We have a password with a single quote in it.  sshexec
does not like the single quote in the password and cannot ssh into a different
machine.
how do you specify the password - in case this actually is a real report and not some kind of sophisticated link spam - URL removed.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
